content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetRoute path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/ipam/v1alpha/stacks/{stack_id}/networks/{network_id}/routes/{route_id} content: params
name stackid
in path
required true
desc a stack id or slug
schema
type str
name networkid
in path
required true
desc a vpc network id or slug
schema
type str
name routeid
in path
required true
desc a vpc route id
schema
type str
sum get a network route
desc blockcallout

  type danger
  body this is an alpha api call and should be considered very unstable please do not execute this in a production environment see our versioning guidelinesdocversioning for more information

/block
responses
200
networkgetrouteresponse
type obj
networkroute
type obj
props
id
type str
readonly true
desc a routes unique identifier
name
type str
desc a routes humanreadable name
slug
type str
desc a routes machinereadable name
stackid
type str
readonly true
desc the id of the stack that a route belongs to
networkid
type str
readonly true
desc the id or slug of the vpc network that a route belongs to
networkmetadata
type obj
props
networkstringmapentry
type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
createdat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was created
nullable true
updatedat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable true
deleterequestedat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that an entity was requested for deletion
nullable true
version
type str
desc an entitys version number

versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
desc metadata associated with an entity
statuses
type arr
networkroutestatus
type obj
props
region
type str
desc the region in which a routes status resides

regions take the form  where pop is a stackpath edgecompute pop and cluster is a networking cluster within that pop
readonly true
routestatusstate
type str
default routestatusunspecified
desc routestatusunspecified route in this region is in an undefined state
  running route has 1 or more assigned gateways and is correctly configured in this region
  nogateway route does not have any assigned gateways but is configured in this region
  deleting route is being deleted from the region
gatewayips
type str
readonly true
desc a list of route gateway ips in the region
readonly true
desc the status of a route in different regions
destinationprefixes
type str
desc a routes destination network prefix in cidr format
gatewayselectors
type arr
routegatewayselector
type obj
interfaceselectors
type arr
networkmatchexpression
type obj
props
key
type str
desc the name of the selector to perform a match against

provide the key workloadplatformstackpathnet/workloadslug to select edgecompute workloads by their slug all network interfaces in the workload are used as the routes gateway
operator
type str
desc the operation to perform to match a selector

valid values are in with support for more possible in the future
values
type str
desc the values to match in the selector
desc an expression to match selectors against a set of values
desc list of match expressions that must all match a single interface
desc selectors that determine which edgecompute workload network interfaces should be be used as the routes gateway

selectors are applied to the route in order with the highest priority assigned to the first gateway
desc a response to retrieve an individual route on a network
title: 34_Virtual Private Cloud_GetRoute_195.json
